title: Setup
desc: As a host, you need a good mic. Above all else, audio is the priority. Next is your background. We don't recommend green screens - just a clean, simple, and slightly aesthetic background works best.

title: Niche
desc: Start with why. Why are you launching a podcast? What are you interested in? If you can answer these, you have your niche.

title: Record
desc: Find a guest. Qualify them with a quick call first to feel their energy. Then schedule the interview, send the invite, and record.

title: Publish
desc: We'll handle the editing -both audio and video. We review it together, then hit publish. Your only job is to stay consistent an get past 10 episodes. 90% of podcasts fail because they never do.
